WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please upload to linked bug - thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
I installed VS2013 and TypeScript RC1. Created a TypeScript project, added a few .ts files, set the Module System project setting to None. Everything fine.

Then I turned "Combine JavaScript output into file" on. What I noticed was that from that point on TypeScript intellisense stopped working. The type and member dropdowns at the top get frozen in the "(refreshing...)" state.

Is this a know issue or am I doing something wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript Intellisense stops working with single JS output

Comments.Message: Could you share the project where you're seeing this happen? We have had other reports of this (https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2273) but haven't been able to reproduce it ourselves.
